data.text:
London: Jonathan Cape, 1982. First Edition. First Impression. Octavo (23cm); grey cloth embossed covered boards stamped in gilt; dustjacket. 249pp.; Slight forward lean; else Near Fine condition. Dustjacket is unclipped (priced £7.50) slight nudge at crown, minimal edgewear, VG+ or better. British Edition precedes US printings.

Winner of the James Tait Black Memorial Prize and Costa Book award (Whitbread Prize) for first novel; source for the 1987 film directed by Andrew Grieve.

Price: $100.00
